Comments_List: In depth understanding of a variety of synthesis methods.
I learned many ways of synthesizing different kinds of nanomaterials.
A lot of knowledge about nanomaterials ans current work in the field.
Basics of nanomaterial synthesis, especially lithography
Great literature survey of current techniques. Assignments were a bit vague.
Many contents, closely to the advanced updates
I believe this course is well organized, no significant weakness
It gives a very good overview of the field and I think it's very effective.

Good overview on basic methods and characterization techniques for nanoparticles and nanostructures, as well as a little bit on their applications.

Powerpoints were sometimes hard to follow due to visibility
Yes, if they are interested in synthesis. Would not recommend if they do not have research experience.
Yes, the class is great, we learned much knowledge that is close to our research.
Yes! It's very important course for students who wants to work for nanomaterials.
Yes, it's a good overview of nanomaterials and helps if you're doing research with nanomaterials
Yes if you are interested in learning more about nanomaterials. However, this class is more for the actual synthesis techniques, per se, not so much on applications.
